scripts.package: npm run build -w @snapmail/elements && npm run package -w snapmail
scripts.devtest: npm run clean:hc & npm run build:webcomponents && npm run build:webapp && npm run start:agent
scripts.devtest:we: npm run clean:hc & npm run build:webcomponents && npm run build:webapp && npm run devtest -w we-applet
scripts.start: npm run build:happ && npm run start:agent
scripts.start:agent: cross-env DEV_MODE='prod' HC_PORT=$(port) ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run build:webcomponents" "npm run start:happ-proxied" "sleep 10 && npm run start -w snapmail"
